repository.orgName: Bibliothèque nationale de France. Département des Manuscrits

msContents.summary: The Cauntariyalakari. See Madras Tamil Lexicon, s.v.: A metrical version in Tamil of Śankarācārya's Saundaryalaharī, by Vīrai-k-kavirāca-paṇṭitar.

collation.desc: 1 folio = guard leaf. No foliation. Blank recto verso.
1 folio = Cauntariyalakari: Title Page. No original foliation. Library Arabic foliation 1. Printed page. Verso blank.
40 folios = Cauntariyalakari: Text. Tamil pagination 2 only. Library Arabic foliation 2-41.
2 folios = guard leaves. No foliation. Blank recto verso.

additions.desc: BnF shelfmark sticker: INDIEN 7 (front cover, recto).
BnF shelfmark in black ink Tamoul N° 7 (f[1]r).
BnF shelfmark in black pencil Tam. 7 (f[1]r).

origin.origDate: Internally dated to the year kīlaka of the Jovian cycle, that is, CE 1848-1849. See printed title page date (U1, f1r). Dated to circa 1850 by Vinson (1868) and to 1850 by Cabaton (1912).

acquisition.p: Received, August 1st, 1866, from the Société Asiatique. See BnF, département des Manuscrits, inventaire 7 = Dons: manuscrits et imprimés documentaires, 1848-1895, no. 1192.

provenance.p: Owned by Édouard Ariel (1818-1854). Bequested by Édouard Ariel to Société Asiatique (Rosny 1868, p. 177).

listBibl.bibl: Cabaton, Antoine (1912). Catalogue sommaire des manuscrits indiens, indo-chinois & malayo-polynésiens. Bibliothèque nationale. Département des manuscrits. Paris: E. Leroux. — See p. 2, no. 7.
Rosny, Léon de (1868). La bibliothèque tamoule de M. Ariel, de Pondichéry. In: Variétés orientales (pp. 177‒224). Paris: Maisonneuve.
Vinson, Julien & Feer, Léon & s.n. (1866-). Catalogue des manuscrits tamoul et télinga. Manuscript, BnF Indien 577. — See f. 2r = p. 2 , no. 7.

Vinson, Julien (1868). Manuscrits tamouls. Proofreadings of the catalogue for Tamoul 1-204 (old shelfmark). Printed by the atelier oriental de l’Imprimerie nationale. BnF “4-IMPROR-77 (B)”. — See p. 2, no. 7. — The same proofreadings with black ink handwritten corrections are found in Vinson et al. (1866-, f1-f49).

p.p: Unmarked puḷḷi, ō, and ē restored. Uppercase for initial vowels (in excerpts only).
c = column, f = folio, lm = left margin, r = recto, rm = right margin, U = unit (codicological and/or textual), v = verso.
